comment.author: 76016463@N00
comment._content: Lobert and Schultz were the 1915 third basemen for the New York Giants and the Brooklyn Dodgers (officially, the Robins), respectively. This was probably taken on opening day at the Polo Grounds, which in 1915 was April 15th. www.baseball-almanac.com/teamstats/schedule.php?y=1915&am...

comment.author: 34911459@N08
comment._content: artolog: thanks for the additional information.  We may add it to the record.

comment.author: 91829349@N00
comment._content: A bit of trivia based on this picture:  Joe Schultz's son, Joe Schultz Jr.,  grew up also to be a major league ballplayer, and went on to immortality as the Seattle Pilots' manager in Jim Bouton's <u>Ball Four</u>.
